column16: Were weather conditions a likely factor?
column22: Would you be willing to share your contact information with local authorities?
column27: Select one or more NoVA FSS Charters to subscribe to communications:
column28: Do you want to use the same contact information as above?
column33: How did you hear about us?
column34: Please let us know where you heard about us?

column10: Witnessed drivers on Courthouse approaching the Nutley intersection in right turn lane (from the west) fail to stop on red at or behind the stop bar. Many roll through the sidewalk and complete a right turn on red without stopping at all. Intersection design does not allow drivers turning right visibility to approaching traffic, so drivers are unable to safely turn right without blocking the crosswalk.
